sentences.sentence: The awakening was almost feline in its stealthiness.
sentences.translation: 这种醒觉，简直和猫的脚步一样地轻悄。

sentences.sentence: The remotely controlled mini attack boat has the advantages of small sizes, fast speed, high striking power, easy deployment, good stealthiness, low cost and so on.
sentences.translation: 微型遥控攻击艇具有体积小、速度快、攻击威力大、布放容易、隐蔽性好及价格低等特点。
